## Triggers - *Set your triggers here*



## Default
- Manual
- Telegram bot with command /forkcheck

## Usage
- /forkcheck = 1000 repositoriesmax
- /forkcheck n = n repositories
- any other command is rejected

## Filter repositories

Select only forked repositories
Required argument: Count to select repositories

## GitHub Fork Status Monitor

This workflow helps you keep an eye on your GitHub forks, notifying you when they fall behind or pull ahead of their upstream repositories.
